lop.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: to cut something, especially branches from a tree, usually with a single strong movement
lop.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: Workmen have lopped off more branches in an effort to save the tree.
lop.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: to reduce an amount, especially of money, by a particular amount
lop.translation[0].definitions[1].exampl: They lopped Â£16 off the price.
Citicorp plans to lop $1.5 billion a year from its operating costs.
